issue.title: duration::operator* has template parameters in funny order

discussion.p: Everywhere else, we always have <rep, period> in that order for a given type. But here, we have Period and Rep2 in reverse order for <Rep2, Period>. This is probably of little importance, since the template parameters are seldom spelled out for a function like this. But changing it now will eliminate a potential source of future errors and confusion.

resolution.p: Change the signature in [time] and [time.duration.nonmember] to:
